con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:8181/cxf/shop"> <resource path="/beers"> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="*/*"> <param name="request" style="plain" type="xs:string"/> </representation> <param name="username" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/all"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="username" style="query" path="/orders"> <resource path="/all"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/{orderId}"> <param
